nodes.text: Sinissima Bel was a female smuggler active in the Post-Imperial Period. One planet she was known to visit was Gamorr where she would smuggle in illegal goods including poison and dangerous creatures to those who hired her to. In 13 ABY when the Jedi Callista Ming was investigating the murder of the Gamorrean Vrokk, and searching for the source of the poison used to kill him, she was told by the poet Sebastin Onyx that Sinissima hadn't been seen on Gamorr since the previous summer.
